attributes.action: Axe pip to adult disability payment like Scotland across to England to be fair
attributes.additional_details: After Scotland approved changes to pip to adult disability payment introduction this year and only having one assessment for your life on your disability the green paper published for pip in England also highlighted this issue among other things and the same needs to be approved in England to make disabilities people have life better and equally treated across the board as the system currently not fit for purpose and currently  discriminate against conditions people have
attributes.background: Scotland approved changes to pip to adult disability payment introduction this year and only having one assessment for your life on your disability the green paper published for pip England also highlighted this issue and the same needs to be approved inEngland to make disability people life better

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Adult Disability Payment is not being introduced in England, so we're not sure what assessments you want to be stopped in England.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
